learnings.pattern: toneConfig defined but not used in prompt
learnings.context: toneDefinitions had description, goodExample, avoidExample but toneConfig variable was set and never referenced in systemMessage
learnings.action: Added <tone_instruction> XML block with all 3 elements
learnings.impact: User-selected tone now actually affects AI output

learnings.context: Phrases like 'glad to hear', 'sounds like', 'hope to see you' are Claude-typical

learnings.pattern: Rating strategies intentionally different for Demo vs Main
learnings.context: Demo needs shorter, punchier responses (1-2 sentences) while Main can be longer (2-3)
learnings.action: Documented as intentional - NOT a bug
learnings.impact: Better first impression on landing page

pending_investigation.potential_impact: Google vs Yelp vs TripAdvisor have different cultures
